Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Milestones.Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to resale of tickets to places of entertainment; repealer
Summary: Relates to resale of tickets to places of entertainment; provides for the regulation of boxing and wrestling relating to tickets to places of entertainment.
LawCode: Rpld & add Art 25 §§25.01 - 25.35, Arts & Cul L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the arts and cultural affairs law, in relation to resale of tickets to places of entertainment; and to repeal article 25 of such law relating thereto
